column1: ##Project Description=Basic Details: 	  Sample Submission ID	373_5739  User	Kawata Manabu  Lab	Lotz  Account Code	(08)RAG049617B(C3-554316)-100.00%  Fee	0.00 USD  Discount	0.00%  Actual Fee	  Quoted Amount	  Expected Date	  Actual Date	  Service Id	 	 	 Project Information:	 Study title	Lotz_0208-2023_MK Sample Type description (e.g. Jurkat cell line: liver tissue)	TC28a2 Human chondrocytes Species	 	 Services:	 Please briefly describe what you would like the Genomics Core to do for you	JC-seq and data analysis 	 Samples:	 Number of Samples submitted	20 How many reads per sample are needed?	5 million reads per sample How many reads total for all samples are needed?	100 million reads 	 Additional Information:	 Would you like Genomics Core to prepare your sequencing libraries?	Yes Which kit? (if not sure: Genomics Core will provide this information)	 Would you like the CCBB to provide data analysis?	Yes We highly recommend completing this section in anticipation of future GEO submissions	 Goal of the Project	Human TC28 cells were treated with DMSO as control: 2 uM mocetinostat: or 40 nM or 160 nM panobinostat (n5). The goal is to elucidate differences of regulation beween mocetinostat and panobinostat. Details of requested bioinformatics analyses	JC-seq analysis with differentially expressed genes (DEGs) as output.  The analyses to be done are as follows:	 1) Moc2uM vs DMSO	 2) Pano40nM vs DMSO	 3) Pano160nM vs DMSO	 4) Pano40nM vs Moc2uM	 5) Pano160nM vs Moc2uM	 6) Pano160nM vs Pano40nM	 References to closely related work (optional)	 Would you prefer to receive a bcl files and/or a fastq files?	Yes 	 Experimental Variables:	 Variable 1	 Variable 2	 Variable 3	 Variable 4	 Variable 5	 Variable 6	 Variable 7
##Analysis Notes=Would you prefer to receive a bcl files and/or a fastq files?	Yes
